propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.disableHighlightToday: If true, todays date is rendering without highlighting with circle.
propDescriptions.disableMargin: If true, days are rendering without margin. Useful for displaying linked range of days.
propDescriptions.isEndOfHighlighting: Set to true if the day is the end of a highlighted date range.
propDescriptions.isEndOfPreviewing: Set to true if the day is the start of a highlighted date range.
propDescriptions.isHighlighting: Set to true if the day is in a highlighted date range.
propDescriptions.isPreviewing: Set to true if the day is in a preview date range.
propDescriptions.isStartOfHighlighting: Set to true if the day is the start of a highlighted date range.
propDescriptions.isStartOfPreviewing: Set to true if the day is the end of a highlighted date range.
propDescriptions.outsideCurrentMonth: If true, day is outside of month and will be hidden.
propDescriptions.showDaysOutsideCurrentMonth: If true, days that have outsideCurrentMonth={true} are displayed.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

rangeIntervalDayHighlightStart.conditions: isStartOfHighlighting=true or day is the start of the month

rangeIntervalDayHighlightEnd.conditions: isEndOfHighlighting=true or day is the end of the month

rangeIntervalDayPreviewStart.conditions: isStartOfPreviewing=true or day is the start of the month

rangeIntervalDayPreviewEnd.conditions: isEndOfPreviewing=true or day is the end of the month
